title: Expert-Involved Design Strategies for Corporate Remote Education Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced scientific knowledge and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to rapidly develop and utilize science-related vocational training content for general citizens aged 40+

learning_goals: Learners can design a mini educational module within two weeks using synchronous online tools and rapid e-learning authoring methods.
Learners can optimize educational materials by applying instructional design techniques required for the Subject Matter Expert (SME) role.
Learners can develop hands-on content to conduct project-based assessments in an LMS-based environment.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
